name: Men's Balance Long Sleeve Top— Black
decription: The Balance Long Sleeve Top acts as the optimal layer during exercise for cool conditions. Made from lightweight Polartec® Delta™ fabric, the shirt assists your body's natural cooling process from your first set to your last. The radiating knit construction and split hem vents provide high-stretch capabilities and increased airflow, helping to dissipate heat and reduce wet-cling as you progress through your workout.

name: Men's Balance T-shirt— Mauve
decription: The Mens Balance T-Shirt is designed for movement. It is equally suited for outdoor training, indoor workouts or running on the track or trail. The lightweight DELTAPEAK® polyester fabric provides superb moisture management, is fast-drying and at the same time adds a sufficient level of UV protection for high-summer use. The T-shirt has a semi-loose fit for a high level of comfort.

name: Balance Insulated Vest— Dark Red
decription: The Men's Insulated Vest is perfectly suited for outdoor training in colder conditions or the in-between commute to and off outdoor training sessions. The PrimaLoft® Eco Black Insulation combined with a DWR finish keeps you warm and dry throughout your movement. This, combined with the lightweight fabric, provides a comfortable piece for layering and flexibility.

name: Oakley Off-Race Hoodie— Black Olive
decription: The Oakley Off-Race Hoodie features a raglan sleeve design and a heavy-weight cotton fabric. Constructed from 320gsm Organic Cotton in Portugal. The hoodie is completed with a kangaroo pocket and drawstring adjustments to its hood for added comfort and functionality. Printed branding on the chest.

name: Women's Balance Sleeveless Top— Black
decription: The Women's Balance Sleeveless Top is designed for movement. It is equally suited for outdoor training, indoor workouts or running on the track or trail. The lightweight DELTAPEAK® polyester fabric provides superb moisture management, is fast-drying and at the same time adds a sufficient level of UV protection for high-summer use. The Sleeveless Top has a slightly fitted construction for secure comfort.

name: Women's Balance Bra— Black
decription: The Women's Balance Bra is suited for both indoor and outdoor movement. The double-knitted interlock fabric has a 4-way stretch, eliminating show-through throughout your movement. This makes the Balance Bra an essential part of your wardrobe for any workout, run or training session. The integrated waistband ensures a high level of comfort during your workout sessions. An integrated body-mapped mesh structure on the front and back provides extra sweat management properties.

name: Women's Balance Long Sleeve T-shirt— Mauve
decription: The Women's Balance Long Sleeve T-Shirt is designed for movement. It is equally suited for outdoor training, indoor workouts or running on the track or trail. The lightweight DELTAPEAK® polyester fabric provides superb moisture management, is fast-drying and at the same time adds a sufficient level of UV protection for high-summer use. The Long Sleeve T-shirt has a semi-loose fit for a high level of comfort.
